item.description:
PLEASE NOTE: This Event is A Part of The Hat Revolution :)

Our early dinners of the past have been a huge hit and a lot of fun so... as a part of our hat revolution, let's meet at 5PM at 29 Newbury for the 29 Newbury Art Gallery (gallery closes at 6PM) for The Art and then afterward, let's grab a bite to eat at the trendy 29 Newbury Restaurant below.

In your best hat, please come and join me for The Art then Dinner as 29 Newbury has both, an outstanding Art Gallery and Restaurant below. Then we'll head to CLINK @ The Liberty Hotel for the final leg of our Revolution!!!

Please RSVP for both events: Hats, Art Then Dinner, and A Revolution of Sorts - A Hat Revolution @ The Liberty Hotel if you plan on attending both. Cheers!

For More Info Please Click on the links below:

A Revolution of Sorts - A Hat Revolution-
http://www.meetup.com...

The 29 Newbury Art Gallery (Open Mon-Sat 10am-6pm)-
http://www.29newbury....

The 29 Newbury Restaurant-
http://www.29newbury....

The 29 Newbury Dinner Menu-
http://www.29newbury....


More About 29 Newbury-
29 provides three distinct seating options: A small dining room that doubles as a showroom for local art; a smaller bar, favored by local fashionistas for its eclectic crowd and famous martinis; and an outdoor dining area allows fantastic views of upper Newbury Street. The upscale menu features fresh salads (arugula with dried cranberries, grape tomatoes, toasted walnuts and goat cheese) and hearty entrees (grilled lamb rack with a pomegranate juice reduction).

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Hats, Art then Dinner: Let's head to 29 Newbury for the 29 Newbury Art Gallery
